version_description:
苹果卫生一体化〜跟踪你的运动和睡眠！

礼貌照片〜尽情享受吧！

- 新的一天到一天导航
- 多种性能改进

- 声音提示启用
- 保存的“提醒我”通知模式
- 多种性能改进

- 统计简介
- 固定提醒

- Introducing Multimedia Notes: inspire, educate & remind yourself of important moments w/ timed photos in the "O".  When you attach a photo to a note, it will show up in the center of your "O" for the allotted time frame.  Use photos to remind you of

- New Edit Highlight
- Multiple performance improvements

Aloha!
- Time Zone fixes.  Take Owaves with you on-the-go, no problems.

- Repeat your O's daily!
- Choose your centerpiece: "Analog Time" or "Little Time"

Dear Owaves Community,

We are thrilled to release our new Expert Routines. Owaves is working closely with Olympians, physicians, registered dietitians and yoga instructors to create 24-hour training programs you can now download through the app.

Dear Owaves Community,

We are thrilled to release our new Expert Routines. Owaves is working closely with Olympians, physicians, registered dietitians and yoga instructors to create 24-hour training programs you can download now through the app.

— Our #1 most popular user request, "Create-a-Button" is out! Choose your own icons, including emojis

— New "Moments" screens for Alert settings, text and photo Notes, and changing activity Titles

— Easier to use with new handlebars and wide

— Set your favorite Complications to Owaves! Apple Watch now optimized for Watch OS4. We recommend the Modular Watch face for best overall experience (see screenshots below).

— Better Calendar navigation
— Improved saving of new Day Plans
— Improved Moments (aka Notes) drawer
— Fixed 24-hour time (aka "military time") settings

Hi Folks,

◉ Incredibly proud & happy to report Calendar integration is now complete! Connect Owaves with your Apple Calendar, Google Calendar, Yahoo Calendar, Microsoft Outlook Calendar, Facebook Events and more...
